definition[0]: the amount of a substance that is necessary for a nuclear chain reaction to start
definition[1]: the smallest number of people or things that are needed in order for something to happen or be possible
example[0]: How can we get a critical mass of people involved to keep the club running?
definition[2]: the minimum number of users, buyers etc that is necessary for a product to succeed or for something to happen
example[1]: A communications system is of no value to the users unless there is a critical mass of users.
